head.title: Bervan Design
head.description: Hi there. Before having fun with Phenomic, be sure to read the documentation : How to setup a new project with Phenomic Getting Started…

body:
Hi there. Before having fun with Phenomic, be sure to read the documentation :

  • How to setup a new project with Phenomic
  • Getting Started with Phenomic
  • Usage & APIs
  • FAQ

Also take a look at existing websites that use Phenomic, some projects share their source code!

Built with React .

You may want to take a look at the 404.html and tweak the render.

If you need to make adjustments, you can directly alter page layouts in src/layouts/; small things like the header, footer, buttons and so on can be changed in src/components/; and for colors and common CSS variables, you can modify postcss.config.js.

You feel like the base theme is not enough or you just saw something wrong? Please help us make Phenomic better!
